verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man was <S%G770>sick,<s%> named <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> of <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> the <S%G2968>town<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary<s%> and her <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G3136>Martha.<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> in the <S%G3571>night,<s%> he <S%G4350>stumbles,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5457>light<s%> in him.

<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, I <S%G1492>know<s%> that he shall <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> in the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G2532>And<s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> and <S%G4100>believes<s%> in me shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G599>die.<s%> <S%G4100>Believe<s%> you this? <S%G5124><s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1145>wept.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> a <S%G4892>council,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> we? for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4592>miracles.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> they for <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G3004>spoke<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%> as they <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> you, that he will not <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1859>feast?<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> a <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> that, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he were, he should <S%G3377>show<s%> it, that they might <S%G4084>take<s%> him.
